Esmun. a kind man ...Esmun's meaning is a kind man. ... Fazli. kind ...The name's meaning is ' kind '. Kind names are somewhat popular baby names for boys. The names rose in popularity from the 1930s up to the 1960s. At the height of their usage in 1965, 1.502% of baby boys were given Kind names. There were 2 Kind names ranked within the top 1000 baby names then.

Usage of these boy names was at its highest in the year 2000 (usage of 0.0913%) and has remained as widespread to this day (usage 0.084%, down 8%), but with names like Cedric and Francis becoming less fashionable. Ellis (#443) and Cade (#361) are two of the more contemporarily stylish birth names here, with Ellis going through a rekindling in popularity. Cad (top 59%) and Benigni (39%) are conventional last names.

NARKISSOS (νάρκισσος): Greek name possibly derived from the word narke, meaning numbness; sleep.. In mythology, this is the name of a vain youth who fell in love with his own reflection and eventually was turned into a kind of lily or daffodil flower known as the narkissos. AL-KARIM (الكريم): Arabic name meaning the generous.. BUJAR: Albanian name meaning generous.. 1  DAZBOG: Variant spelling of Slavic Dazhdbog, meaning give-me god, probably in the sense of a giving god. 2  DAZH
